migrate_monday_field_mapping_desc: JustDo maintains compatibility with Monday's fields.
migrate_monday_field_mapping_details: Below, each item maps a Monday field to its JustDo equivalent, followed by notes and added capabilities in parentheses:
migrate_monday_timeline: Timeline → Start Date, End Date, Due Date (with full Gantt view support)
migrate_monday_dependency: Dependency → Dependencies (supports FS, SS, FF, SF relationships with lag/lead)
migrate_monday_time_tracking: Time tracking → Time Tracker Plugin (logs time spent per task member with detailed reporting)
migrate_monday_files: Files → Files (enterprise-grade storage, locally, air-gapped, encrypted-in-rest, stored, or in the cloud)
migrate_monday_people: People → Users/Owner (each task gets an assigned owner, and always have an owner)
migrate_monday_doc: Monday Doc → Description (rich text WYSIWYG editor with file support)
migrate_monday_tags: Tags → Immutable Tags field/Mutable Multi Options field
migrate_monday_no_mapping: Right now, JustDo does not have a direct mapping for these fields:
